text: UMS may refer to: * Ulnar–mammary syndrome * Underwriting Management System, for automated Insurance Underwriting * Unified Messaging (System, Server, or Service) * Uniform Mark Scheme * United Mexican States (Official name of Mexico) * UMS, abbreviation of "Universal Measurement System" used for Gross tonnage * Universal Media Server * Universal Media Studios * Universal Mobile Systems * Universiti Malaysia Sabah (in Malaysia) * University of Maine System * University of Mississippi * USB mass storage device class * User-Mode Scheduling, Preemption (computing)
title: UMS
